title: A New Vision for Health Care
cleaned_text:
FLCCC Chief Scientific Officer, Dr. Paul Marik, opens up to Dr. Joseph Mercola on what COVID-19 revealed about the medical system:

“I had swallowed the Kool-Aid. I was a tenured professor of medicine. I was the only one tenured in my department, in fact. I believed the medical literature, I believed the narrative. I believed what I taught, and you can understand how disturbing it is to one’s very core when you discover that what you’ve been teaching and promoting is based on lies, falsehood and deception … We had a really successful protocol for treating COVID in the hospital. That’s how we really started the MATH+ protocol. We knew it was effective. My results were better than any of my colleagues’. But the hospital decided to basically outlaw what I was doing.”

Click here to watch the complete in-depth interview,”A New Vision for Health Care.”
